description:
This course will teach you everything you need to know to create profitable niche-market online stores with almost no investment.

Right from niche selection, product sourcing, marketing and getting targeted traffic, pricing correctly, strategies to retain customers, customer support issues, to running Facebook ads for maximum conversions. This course has everything you need to know.

The entire course is divided into logical segments so you can take the bits you are interested in first and then go for supplementary knowledge at any time.

This is not just a course, it's a reference and you can come back to it whenever you need info.

If you're interested in entrepreneurship and wish to sell online this is a perfect roadmap for you, giving you the soft and technical skills you need.
title: Create a Profitable ECommerce Business - The Complete Guide
